data.actual_result: The outline is continuous on dark theme but discontinuous on light theme.
data.expected_result: The outline is same on both themes.
data.short_description: The outline of the Wumpus in the pending friend requests screen is discontinuous on light theme whereas it is continuous on dark theme.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the pending friend requests screen of the friends tab on dark theme and observe that the outline of the Wumpus is continuous. - Now, switch to light theme and observe the outline of the Wumpus.
